name: CGImagePropertyOrientation
desc: A value describing the intended display orientation for an image.

items.name: case up
items.desc: The encoded image data matches the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case upMirrored
items.desc: The encoded image data is horizontally flipped from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case down
items.desc: The encoded image data is rotated 180° from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case downMirrored
items.desc: The encoded image data is vertically flipped from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case leftMirrored
items.desc: The encoded image data is horizontally flipped and rotated 90° counter-clockwise from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case right
items.desc: The encoded image data is rotated 90° clockwise from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case rightMirrored
items.desc: The encoded image data is horizontally flipped and rotated 90° clockwise from the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case left
items.desc: The encoded image data is rotated 90° clockwise from the image's intended display orientation.
